sentences.en: His is a hellish promiscuity, desperate not so much for love as for loss.
sentences.cn: 那是地狱般混乱的爱欲沉沦, 爱比不爱更绝望.

sentences.en: In fact, bonobo promiscuity seems to be an example of this.
sentences.cn: 事实上倭黑猩猩的混交行为便是佐证.

sentences.en: There is also no doubt that she falls into promiscuity at last.
sentences.cn: 同时无疑她最后也堕入性乱.

sentences.en: Women may also change as often as they likeand promiscuity carries no social stigma.
sentences.cn: 女子是可以随时随意更换男子的,完全不用背负放荡的名声.
